access_token.description: The access token to be used for authentication

email.description: The email address of the user

error.description: The error message if the request was unsuccessful

error_code.description: The error code if the request was unsuccessful

refresh_token.description: The refresh token to be used to refresh the access token after it expires

session.description: The short-lived session token required for authentication

success.description: Whether or not the request was successful or not

token_type.description: The type of token being returned

user_id.description: The ID of the user that was created
